command: dd if="$HOME/Documents/notes.txt" of="/dev/disk/by-id/usb-SanDisk_Ultra_Fit_1234-0:0" bs=64K count=$(( ( $(stat -c%s "$HOME/Documents/notes.txt") + 65535 ) / 65536 )) conv=fsync status=none
explanation: Copies a text file directly onto the raw USB disk using a calculated count to write only the required blocks, limiting media impact.
rationale_steps: Get the source file size to compute the number of 64K blocks needed
Target the USB disk by unique by-id path
Use dd to write only the necessary blocks and flush to media
